name: Tunnel Aviator
description:
Controls:
Move: Arrow Keys / Joystick
Boost: Space / R2 (Controller)
Shoot: F / X (Controller)

Tunnel Aviator is a space shooter where you have to shoot enemies and avoid obstacles in an endless generated tunnel to beat your personal highscore. Collecting coins, hearts and boosters might help you to achieve this faster.

Also unlock other ships with different attributes like damage and speed and see which fits you best.

Settings will be added soon!

Other Features:

- Mobile Accelerator (control the ship with your phone's tilt)
- Destroy structures/enemies when boosting through them
- Shoot Button
- Boost Button
- Controller Support
